fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know if your target is a Dark Ancestor/Neutral scum or if they visited a Dark Ancestor/Neutral scum **OR** if they are a High Ancestor/good Neutral or visited a High Ancestor/good Neutral
- You will only learn High and/or Dark for each check depending if they fulfill the condition
- If a High Ancestor or Neutral scum died the previous night, you will only check for the first conditions (if they areâ€¦)
